sentence.Network_en: The foregoing provisions shall be applicable , mutatis mutandis, to utility models.
sentence.Network_cn: (5)上述各项规定准用于实用新型.

sentence.Network_en: The two preceding paragraphs shall apply mutatis mutandis to the services of an enterprise.
sentence.Network_cn: 前二项规定于事业之服务准用之.

sentence.Network_en: The provisions of this Article shall apply mutatis mutandis to price undertakings accepted under Article 8.
sentence.Network_cn: 5本条的规定在细节上作必要修改后应适用于根据第8条接受的价格承诺.
